item.title: River Financial Corp 10-K
item.description: River Financial Corp, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 14, 2023 had 39631 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 477 instances loan - 381 instances financial - 372 instances bank - 340 instances 1 - 334 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
